resources.string: Certain AllJoyn products require initial setup.\nPlease select setup tutorials for these products listed below:
After the WiFi setup, LIFX products are made accessible from this AllJoyn device plugin.

Please install LIFX app from Google Play.\n\nAfter the app was launched, follow instructions to setup WiFi of a LIFX product. As for a WiFi network the LIFX product connects to, select the one this Android device is connected to.
